actions.text: On agreeing to the Franks (NJ) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment requires final regulatory impact analyses to contain a statement of whether a proposed rule will require anyone to obtain licenses, permits, or other certifications, and to specify any associated fees or fines.
purpose: An amendment to require final regulatory impact analyses to contain a statement of whether the rule will require anyone to obtain licenses, permits, or other certifications, and to specify any associated fines.
